definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Appropriate amount of rim chlorite also played an active role in the protection of reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 适量的环边绿泥石也对储层起到了一定的保护作用。

sentences.english: Their mineral weathering degree is relatively low and the clay minerals are mainly composed of illite, chlorite and kaolinite.
sentences.chinese: 矿物风化度低，粘土矿物组成以伊利石，绿泥石为主。

sentences.english: Chlorite in Furong tin allotment can be divided into two stages of mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉锡矿田中的绿泥石可分为两个矿化阶段。

sentences.english: XRD analysis shows that the mineral composition of the chlorite jade is mainly chlorite.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射分析结果表明，该绿泥石玉的物相为绿泥石。

sentences.english: XRD analysis shows that the mineral composition of the chlorite jade is mainly chlorite.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射分析结果表明，该绿泥石玉的物相为绿泥石。

sentences.english: Of these minerals kaolinite illite and chlorite are commonest.
sentences.chinese: 在这些矿物中，高岭石，伊利石和绿泥石最常见。

sentences.english: Corrensite forms networks of crinkled or folded sheets.
sentences.chinese: 柯绿泥石呈卷曲网状或折迭片状。

sentences.english: In the end, an application example of stilpnomelane is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后以黑硬绿泥石为例介绍检索系统的使用方法。

sentences.english: In the Ranger area highly chloritic rocks were believed to be altered dolerites.
sentences.chinese: 兰杰地区的强烈绿泥石化岩石据信可能是蚀变粒玄岩。

sentences.english: Clinochlore along with quartz are the principal constituents of the matrix.
sentences.chinese: 与石英一起的斜绿泥石是基质的主要组成部分。

definition: orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
veinstone (stone containing a vein of precious metal)
